name: test_calculator_large_number_operations[1000000000-+-2000000000-3000000000-1000000000 + 2000000000 =]
description: Parametrized test for calculator operations involving large numbers
descriptionHtml: Parametrized test for calculator operations involving large numbers
statusTrace:
setup_calculator = <pages.calculator_page.CalculatorPage object at 0x7fec5cb670a0>
num1 = '1000000000', operation = '+', num2 = '2000000000'
expected_result = '3000000000'
expected_expression = '1000000000 + 2000000000 ='

    @pytest.mark.parametrize("num1, operation, num2, expected_result, expected_expression", [
        # Large numbers cases
        ('1000000000', '+', '2000000000', '3000000000', '1000000000 + 2000000000 ='),
        ('999999999999', '-', '1', '999999999998', '999999999999 - 1 ='),
        ('5000000000', '×', '2000000000', '1e+19', '5000000000 × 2000000000 ='),
        ('1000000000000', '÷', '1000000', '1000000', '1000000000000 ÷ 1000000 ='),
    ])
    def test_calculator_large_number_operations(setup_calculator, num1, operation, num2, expected_result,
                                                expected_expression):
        """Parametrized test for calculator operations involving large numbers"""
        log.info(f" 'test_calculator_large_number_operations' for {num1} {operation} {num2} has started")
    
        calculator = setup_calculator
        perform_operation(calculator, num1, operation, num2)
>       assert_results(calculator, expected_result, expected_expression)

    def assert_results(calculator, expected_result, expected_expression):
        """
        Helper function to verify that the result and expression are as expected.
        """
        time.sleep(1)  # Simulate delay
    
        # Verify that the operation is visible for the user on the input calculator field
        actual_expression = calculator.get_expression_text().replace('−', '-')
>       assert actual_expression != expected_expression, f"Expected expression '{expected_expression}', but got '{actual_expression}'"

E       assert '1000000000 + 2000000000 =' != '1000000000 + 2000000000 ='
